description: Gmail REST API access for label management. Provides OAuth2 token retrieval and authenticated HTTP fetching.

functions.name: getAccessToken
functions.description: Get a Gmail OAuth2 access token for the given account. Returns empty string if not Gmail or unavailable.

functions.name: gmailFetch
functions.description: Authenticated Gmail API request from privileged context (bypasses CORS). Returns JSON response body as string, or empty string on error.
